div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%
div.p: Profiles: CRMI Shareable StructureDefinition, CRMI Publishable StructureDefinition

table.style: border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; font-size: 11px; font-family: verdana; vertical-align: top;

description.value: Data elements for the IMMZ.D17.Report AEFI Data Dictionary Activity.

name.value: Mapping from the IMMZ.D17 to the IMMZAdverseEvent profile

definition.value: Data elements for the IMMZ.D17.Report AEFI Data Dictionary Activity.

display.value: Injection or infusion for therapeutic or diagnostic purposes associated with injury or harm in therapeutic use
Finding reported by subject or history provider (finding)

definition.value: Indicates observation of an adverse event/reaction

display.value: Date and time of onset of vaccination adverse event

human.value: Required if input in IMMZ.D.DE92 Reaction reported is Yes

display.value: Other serum reactions. This code includes 'Complications of vaccination, serum reaction'. A more specific code may be selected based on the documented reaction/manifestation

definition.value: The manifestation of the reaction (e.g. infected abscess, swelling, rash, hives, diarrhoea, etc.) observed after administering the vaccine

human.value: Required if input in IMMZ.D.DE92 Reaction reported is Yes

definition.value: If the event resulted in a reaction, what is the type of reaction

human.value: Required if input in IMMZ.D.DE92 Reaction reported is Yes

definition.value: There was another important reaction or medical event

display.value: Adverse reaction to component of vaccine product (disorder)

definition.value: The outcome of the reaction (e.g. death, recovered, recovering)

human.value: Required if input in IMMZ.D.DE92 Reaction reported is Yes
